span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用类来循环访问一系列对象。Use the class to iterate through a collection of objects. 您可以访问此集合使用的对象属性或属性。You can access this collection of objects using the property or the property. 类还用于创建扩展的自定义类型类。The class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. /configSections> ```
